title: Project-Based Collaborative Learning Design Using Online Discussion Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Collaborative Learning Environment Utilizing Social Studies Topics for Office/Administrative Professionals, Blending Asynchronous Online Discussion Forums and Offline Sessions via Bring-Your-Own-Device (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can iteratively improve project drafts through peer assessment and feedback using online discussion forums
Learners can write detailed reports outlining community problem-solving strategies through team collaboration (3+ members)
Learners complete 80% or more of the project process through mid-term presentations and peer feedback sessions

resources: Online Discussion Forum Platform (Edito, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
